#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
long long int exp[50]={1LL,2LL,4LL,8LL,16LL,32LL,64LL,128LL,256LL,512LL,1024LL,2048LL,4096LL,8192LL,16384LL,32768LL,65536LL,131072LL,262144LL,524288LL,1048576LL,2097152LL,4194304LL,8388608LL,16777216LL,33554432LL,67108864LL,134217728LL,268435456LL,536870912LL,1073741824LL,2147483648LL,4294967296LL,8589934592LL,17179869184LL,34359738368LL,68719476736LL,137438953472LL,274877906944LL,549755813888LL,1099511627776LL,2199023255552LL,4398046511104LL,8796093022208LL,17592186044416LL,35184372088832LL,70368744177664LL,140737488355328LL,281474976710656LL,562949953421312LL};
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int a;
        scanf("%d",&a);
        printf("%lld\n",(exp[a-1]%1000));
    }
    return 0;
}
